definition: the back of the head/(fig.) the back of one's mind
to banish from one's thoughts/to ignore/to take no notice

sentences.english: We left the hustle and bustle of the city behind us and departed for the beach.
sentences.chinese: 我们将都市的熙攘抛在脑后，出发前往海边。

sentences.english: They often tie their long ears back.
sentences.chinese: 她们常常把长耳朵捆在脑后。

sentences.english: How can youngsters cast aside etiquette and shame?
sentences.chinese: 年轻人又怎能将礼仪和羞耻心抛到脑后呢？

sentences.english: He lay on the grass, with his hands crossed under his head, looking at the stars in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 他躺在草地上，手交叉放在脑后，望着天上的星星。

sentences.english: The protocerebral bridge and the postcerebral bridge show GABA-like immunoreactivity.
sentences.chinese: 前脑桥和脑后桥都显示GABA阳性反应。

sentences.english: Face round, please so that I can cut your hair at the back.
sentences.chinese: 请转过头去，我给你剪剪脑后的头发。

sentences.english: You go to bars and drink beers and play darts. You all ignore your girlfriends.
sentences.chinese: 你们总是去酒吧喝酒玩飞镖，把女朋友忘在脑后。

sentences.english: She said, flinging back her shawl and baring her beautiful head to the bitter wind.
sentences.chinese: 她说道，把技巾甩在脑后，光着美丽的脑袋顶着寒风。

sentences.english: You sat by my side, long hair tied behind, cool and killing.
sentences.chinese: 君坐妾之侧，长发束于脑后，英姿勃发。

sentences.english: By midmorning I was busy at work and had completely forgotten about the whole thing.
sentences.chinese: 整个上午一直很忙，把这件事情也完全抛在了脑后。

sentences.english: The tiger rider, dark-eyebrows above his twinkling eyes, was in beige suit, black hair binded behind.
sentences.chinese: 那骑士浓眉朗目，身穿米色西服，黑发扎在脑后。

sentences.english: Leave your problems behind, advises Kaslow.
sentences.chinese: Kaslow建议把你的问题抛到脑后。

sentences.english: Her hair is parted in the middle and tied in a ponytail.
sentences.chinese: 她头发中分，脑后扎了一个马尾巴。

sentences.english: Vasili took a step to the side and positioned his gun behind the wife's head.
sentences.chinese: 瓦西里往边上一步，把他的枪放在那个妻子的脑后。

sentences.english: Her long, fine hair was swept back in a ponytail.
sentences.chinese: 她长长的秀发在脑后梳成一个马尾。
可是阿诺德如此热情的总结很快就被人们忘在了脑后。

definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon
hair worn in a bun or coil
to gather together/to collect/to approach/to draw near to/to add/to sum up/to comb (hair)
Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
plait/braid/pigtail/a mistake or shortcoming that may be exploited by an opponent/handle/CL:根[gen1],條|条[tiao2]
